full_summary:
**National Defence Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Title

Psychometric Testing Tool and Group Reports for Defence Team Coaching Program

### Reference Number

cb-7638-26776781

### Amendment Number

1

### Solicitation Number

W7809A124004/A

### Tender Closing Date

2023-08-03T14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

### Expected Contract Start Date

2023-09-15

### Expected Contract End Date

2024-03-29

### Tender Description

The Defence Team Coaching Program aims to promote a culture of leadership, respect, and honour within the Canadian Armed Forces. The program requires a psychometric testing tool to support the development of key competencies among its clients. The desired outcome is to provide coaching clients with tools that enhance their self-awareness, leadership skills, and interpersonal relationships.

### Required Services

The successful bidder will provide the following services:

* Bilingual Enneagram tests for individuals and teams
* Training and accreditation services to certify administrators in understanding and applying the Enneagram
* Technical support for account administration on a vendor-hosted platform
* Access to a reliable contact person for test-related questions
* Availability of multiple test versions for different level groups (personal tests and group/team tests)

### Deliverables

The bidder must provide the psychometric tests and required certifications in both official languages (English and French) and make them available on an ongoing basis throughout the fiscal year. The initial contract period is one year, with three optional periods of one year each.

### Language of Work

The psychometric tests and required certifications must be offered in both official languages.

### Date of Delivery

All deliverables must be available by September 15th, 2023.

### Special Considerations

* The tests must be available in several versions to accommodate different level groups.
* The bidder must be able to offer continuing education to Defence Team Coaching Program certified coaches.

### Contracting Entity

National Defence

### Contact Information

* Viktoria Melnichuk, Contracting Officer
* Email: [viktoria.melnichuk@forces.gc.ca](mailto:viktoria.melnichuk@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 302-1534

### Tender Documents

The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal, can be found on the Canada Buys website. Interested bidders must submit their proposal by the tender closing date.

---
